#summary Prepare IDE Eclipse to develop Web Application

= Introduction =

This text helps you prepare an IDE Eclipse to develop Web Application, Google App and Android


= Details =
=== 1. Download and install JDK 1.6 ===
=== 2. Download customized Eclipse JEE ===
Link:
1) http://www.ziddu.com/download/14710081/eclipse-jee-helios-SR2-win32-OpenOnes-0.6.tar.gz.001.html


2) http://www.ziddu.com/download/14710119/eclipse-jee-helios-SR2-win32-OpenOnes-0.6.tar.gz.002.html

3) http://www.google.com/url?sa=D&q=http://www.ziddu.com/download/14710259/eclipse-jee-helios-SR2-win32-OpenOnes-0.6.tar.gz.003.html

Use [http://7zip.org 7zip ] to combine and un-compress three above files (Assumption: you un-compress into D:/eclipse-jee-helios-SR2-win32-OpenOnes-0.6. This folder is called $ECLIPSE_HOME)

You can try to run the eclipse by execute $ECLIPSE_HOME/eclipse/eclipse.exe.

=== 3. Configure JDK for eclipse ===
Default, the eclipse uses JRE. Now, you re-configure the eclipse to use JDK.
